thread.title: BRIEF-Sabana Shariah Compliant Industrial Real Estate Investment Trust Names ‍Han Yong Lee As CEO

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sabana Shariah Compliant Industrial Real Estate Investment Trust Names ‍Han Yong Lee As CEO

organizations.name: sabana shariah compliant industrial real estate investment trust
brief-sabana shariah compliant industrial real estate investment trust names

text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Sabana Shariah Compliant Industrial Real Estate Investment Trust:
* APPOINTS ‍HAN YONG LEE AS CEO * AW WEI BEEN CEASED TO BE ACTING CEO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
